review.title: “Fun screenprinting operation”
review.pros: Pros – I like the fact that w e printed single custom tshirts because there was a lot of interaction with the customers. It was a fun environment and so busy that time went very quickly. There was always something to do and I was never bored!
review.cons: Cons – We would accept rush orders from customers that had left it to the last minute to have their printing done. These were often complicated and short run jobs that were frankly a pain to have to do.... they were profitable though!
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – The owners a lovely people to work for but they should stop accepting rush jobs at the last minute.
